content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created. I received a command to browse a website and gather information on the different types of AI. The website provided an overview of AI, including its definition, history, sub-fields, and philosophical and ethical considerations, but did not provide a direct answer to the question.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence", "question": "Can you summarize the information on the website about AI?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a collection of various sources and articles covering the history, development, subfields, applications, risks, and ethical implications of artificial intelligence (AI), as well as related fields such as cybernetics and emerging technologies. It provides a broad overview of the current state and future potential of AI, including discussions on machine learning, neural networks, robotics, and the impact of AI on society and employment.', type='action_result')]
"""
